mapper.insert: insert into Review (bookID, review, reviewer) values (#{bookID}, #{review}, #{reviewer})
mapper.update: update Review set Review = #{review}, updateDate = Now() where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select /*+INDEX(review idx_review) */ rno, bookID, review, reviewer, reviewDate, updatedate from review where bookID = #{bookID} and rno > 0 order by rno asc limit #{cri.amount} OFFSET GREATEST( (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}, 0)
select count(rno) from review where bookID = #{bookID}
